item.title: Math Formula Test
item.description:
Asset Pricing Model

Here is an inline formula: $E[R_i] - R_f = \beta_i(E[R_m] - R_f)$.

Here is a block formula (CAPM):

$$ r_{i,t} = \alpha_i + \beta_i r_{m,t} + \epsilon_{i,t} $$

Where $\epsilon_{i,t} \sim N(0, \sigma^2)$.
